SELECT BA.*, IFNULL(BAD.BAD_COUNT,0) BAD_COUNT, CONCAT(SF.SF_PATH,'@@@',SF.SF_NAME) IMG_PATH, CONCAT(LSF.SF_PATH,'@@@',LSF.SF_NAME) IMG_PATH_IN FROM BUS_ACHIEVEMENT BA LEFT JOIN (SELECT BA_ID,COUNT(1) BAD_COUNT FROM BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_DETAIL WHERE BW_ID = #{ID} GROUP BY BA_ID)BAD ON BAD.BA_ID = BA.ID LEFT JOIN SYS_FILE SF ON SF.SF_TABLE_NAME = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT' AND SF.SF_TABLE_ID = BA.ID AND SF.ID = (SELECT MIN(SF.ID) FROM SYS_FILE SF WHERE SF.SF_TABLE_NAME = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT' AND SF.SF_TABLE_ID = BA.ID GROUP BY SF.SF_TABLE_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_FILE LSF ON LSF.SF_TABLE_NAME = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT' AND LSF.SF_TABLE_ID = BA.ID AND LSF.ID = (SELECT MAX(SF.ID) FROM SYS_FILE SF WHERE SF.SF_TABLE_NAME = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT' AND SF.SF_TABLE_ID = BA.ID GROUP BY SF.SF_TABLE_ID) WHERE BA.IS_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY BAD.BAD_COUNT DESC,BA.BA_ENTRYTIME ASC

SELECT CONCAT(SF.SF_PATH,'@@@',SF.SF_NAME) IMG_PATH, CONCAT(LSF.SF_PATH,'@@@',LSF.SF_NAME) IMG_PATH_IN FROM SYS_DICT_INFO SDI LEFT JOIN SYS_FILE SF ON SF.SF_SDT_CODE = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_END' AND SF.SF_TABLE_ID = '1' AND SF.ID = (SELECT MIN(SF.ID) FROM SYS_FILE SF WHERE SF.SF_TABLE_ID = '1' AND SF_SDT_CODE = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_END' GROUP BY SF.SF_TABLE_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_FILE LSF ON LSF.SF_SDT_CODE = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_END' AND LSF.SF_TABLE_ID = '1' AND LSF.ID = (SELECT MAX(SF.ID) FROM SYS_FILE SF WHERE SF.SF_TABLE_ID = '1' AND SF_SDT_CODE = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_END' GROUP BY SF.SF_TABLE_ID) WHERE SDI.SDT_CODE = 'BUS_ACHIEVEMENT_END'
